message: Your offer was generous, but I think this split accounts for the time value of the money.  Let's close this out.
Considering inflation, this is a better deal for you than my first offer.
Alice, this is my final offer. I understand you value fairness, but the money is literally losing value for me with each passing round. This is a compromise, and it's time to finalize this.
You said the money is losing value for you, but it's not for me. This is my best offer yet, considering the circumstances.
